name: ListLog
description: Retrieve a list of all logs.

ServiceSid.description: The SID of the Service to read the Log resource from.

EnvironmentSid.description: The SID of the environment with the Log resources to read.

FunctionSid.description: The SID of the function whose invocation produced the Log resources to read.

StartDate.description: The date/time (in GMT, ISO 8601) after which the Log resources must have been created. Defaults to 1 day prior to current date/time.

EndDate.description: The date/time (in GMT, ISO 8601) before which the Log resources must have been created. Defaults to current date/time.

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
